metadata.title: CVE-2017-12839 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer over-read in the getbits function insrc/libmpg123/getbits.h in mpg123 through 1.25.5 allows remote attackers tocause a possible denial-of-service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted mp3 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.25.10-1
libout123-0 - 1.25.10-1
mpg123 - 1.25.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.25.10-1').
